" Eric Schmidt was also criticized for allowing Google be overtaken by Facebook, for the company's increasingly frequent privacy scandals and its increasing internal bureaucracy. Together with the co- founders, he decided to step aside.In announcing the move Thursday, Eric Schmidt said that the company no longer needed his "adult supervision and that Page, 38, was ready to run the world's leading internet company.
